answers.answer: "Now I am suffering from heavyness in the left side of the Chest. Does this due to diabetes or due to smoking?"Smoking"Am I prone for heart diseases"Yes among other things associated with heavy smoking and diabetes"Is there any permanent cure/medicine for diabetis?. "No

question: HelloI ma type -2 diabetic for the last three years and using medicines (oral pills). I used to smoke a lot and few days back i stopped smoking. Now I am suffering from heavyness in the left side of the Chest. Does this due to diabetes or due to smoking? Am I prone for heart diseases. Is there any permanent cure/medicine for diabetis?.
title: Diabetes, smoking, acidity and chest pain
